prepare

public void prepare()
Resets all the sums and prepares for new process.

reset

public void reset()
Resets all the weights to random and outputs to 0.0f;

process

public void process(Sample s)
Takes input and processes it through the network. The outputs are saved into each neuron and you can get the final output from the output neurons with getOutput().

train

public void train(TrainingSet t)
Takes in a training set and trains the network. This function stops the program while training, and may halt the process if there are very many samples. If you want to see the training happen in real time use the trainLive() function. To train sample by sample. Warning: Back propagation! HOLD ON TO THINE JIMMIES.

Parameters:
t -

trainLive

public void trainLive(Sample s)
Trains sample by sample and allows you to render the network as it's being trained. HOLD ON TO THINE JIMMIES.

Parameters:
s -
